sections.heading: Records6-831.RecordsAll escrow agents shall keep and maintain at all times in their principal places of business complete and suitable records of all escrow transactions made by them, together with books, papers and data clearly reflecting the financial condition of the business of such agents
sections.text: Records6-831.RecordsAll escrow agents shall keep and maintain at all times in their principal places of business complete and suitable records of all escrow transactions made by them, together with books, papers and data clearly reflecting the financial condition of the business of such agents.
